page.title: 13A DAY FOR A CATHOLIC GIRL
page.content: I wake up and find myself back in my own house feeling great.Suddenly I remember about school.I get myself ready and go to school.We have an {assembly}on Tuesday and listen to the readings of the gospel.Fourth lesson we have our{Religious Education.}We are taught about Baptism,Forgivness, Holy Communion, Confirmation and Holy Matrimony. On feast days we go in the hall and have{mass}.We have {mass {sometimes in the}chapel.The {Pope}came to visit our school.Our school is called St.Peters High School.{R.C.}The { R.C.}meaning{Roman Catholic.}We go to mass on Sunday and go to mass on feast days.This is a day in the life of a Catholic schoolgirl. Rebecca Towey, 1S.
